nodes.text: D-7RZ was a protocol droid used by the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War. In 3638 BBY D-7RZ was on the Carrick Station, where he relayed to an important figure a priority request from Supreme Chancellor Leontyne Saresh to report to Major Vom Dresid on the Gav Daragon.

D-7RZ appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel as the Operation courier for the "Scum and Villainy" operation. Originally present on the Carrick Station, he was moved to Gav Daragon with Update 4.0.
